title: please help me i need advice on how can i carry my teams
body: these past few games ive been getting really horrible teammates...i mean REALLY REALLY BAD just look at my last played game, im not the best player in the world but i can hold my own and do pretty well most of the time but i admit i can not carry teams for crap i just cant i can only carry myself and do good on my own i just need advice thatll help me carry my teams since riot seems to like to put me with bad teammates, or maybe some people can add me and we can duo queue? someone please help me because this is super frustrating when i keep getting teams like this it makes me want to quit this game it feels very unfair

replies.body:
I notice you play a lot of zed. 
With champs like that, it's about more than just winning your lane. You have to roam and help other lanes post 6. I usually play cho gath mid since he clear well and other assassins try to roam, I can ping like crazy and keep pushing and take towers.

Some games simply can't be carried.
Particularly right now.

Wait until Solo / Duo comes out and it'll be easier.
Watch one of the million youtube videos on how to climb.

> [{quoted}](name=theArtifacts,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=zVMBqTuU,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-15T00:44:38.575+0000)
>
> Some games simply can't be carried.
> Particularly right now.
> 
> Wait until Solo / Duo comes out and it'll be easier.
> Watch one of the million youtube videos on how to climb.

Thats not true, well yes games right now are a bit unbalenced but during the official season period, nothing is in your way of achiving a win rate over 50% to climb, OTHER THAN YOUR OWN SKILL. :) Sure u cant win them all, but your skill level will take you to where you belong.

Get better at what you do.

I see you prefer to take Assassin midlanes, And a lot of the time its mostly Zed, However, I also notice that the games are mostly hit and miss, And quite a lot is because of other lanes losing.

I'd suggest trying to work on roaming.

 However, I also suggest working on a more solid plan for zed alone, As i notice that, Despite being an assassin, You play zed more of a Bruiser than an Assassin. Now, I dont play zed a lot, However, i know that he, Strictly, Scales with Damage and CDR. While, Yes, BC Offers 20 CDR and quite a bit of good armor shred, That most of the games you build more bruiser-esque than damage, That you typically lose. 

Take some time and work on how exactly you want to zed, And try to make a 100% accurate step by step guide that can work for YOU.

I also notice that, Despite maining AD Champs, You have a natural aptitude for AP Champs, So i suggest try playing around with other champions. Yes, Zed is a great champ to be great at, But reminder that he has a resource bar that he cant modify to playstyle, And honestly, He wont fit in a lot of comps.

Thank you for the advice ill try to build a little differently but its mostly because of the tanks i go bruiser so i can kill them alot easier they usually get fed by my teams and also im working toward buying aurelion sol whos my second man
